description: Enterprise techniques used by Arp, ATT&CK software S0099 v1.1
name: Arp (S0099)

techniques.comment: [Arp](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0099) can be used to display a host's ARP cache, which may include address resolutions for remote systems.(Citation: TechNet Arp)(Citation: Palo Alto ARP)
[Arp](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0099) can be used to display ARP configuration information on the host.(Citation: TechNet Arp)
